responses.rationale: The segment describes an event (infection and killing), not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes the scale of impact (killing of birds), not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes the scale of impact in a location, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment provides background data, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment provides background data, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes locations of cases, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes a specific case, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes the geographic spread of cases, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes the suspected cause of spread, not capabilities or preparedness.
